name: ZS - Ascend Sage
text:
If you control no cards, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). A "Utopia" Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains the following effect. You can only use the preceding effect of "ZS - Ascend Sage" once per turn.
? If it is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Normal Spell from your Deck to your hand.
